response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet and exceed your expectations. Considering its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,250,000.

I understand that such an investment requires careful consideration. Therefore, please take the time to review the product's features and value proposition. If you find this offer compelling, I would be more than happy to discuss further details and answer any questions you might have.

Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. Let's make this extraordinary opportunity a reality!

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
